rpgonline

Class RPGGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame
      • rpgonline.RPGGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlledInputReciever, ControllerListener, Game, InputListener, KeyListener, MouseListener

    public abstract class RPGGame
extends StateBasedGame

    A class with added support for RPGOnline games. This class is based on StateBasedGame. In addtion, some parts of loading (e.g. Music) can be defered by overriding the load method.

    Author:
    Tomas

    • Constructor Detail

      • RPGGame

        public RPGGame(String title)

        Create a new RPGGame.

        The creation of this object will write some information to the log (via RPGOnline.queryVersionData()).

        Parameters:
        title - The name of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • textureLoad

        public abstract void textureLoad(GameContainer container,
                                 RPGGame game,
                                 LoadCounter counter)
                          throws SlickException

        A method during which textures are loaded. This should be overridden with a method to load the required textures.

        Parameters:
        container - The container holding the game.
        game - This game.
        counter - An interface providing access to a loading screen.
        Throws:
        SlickException - Indicates an internal error occurred in the game.

      • load

        public abstract void load(GameContainer container,
                          RPGGame game,
                          LoadCounter counter)
                   throws SlickException

        A method during which music and other things that do not require an OpenGL context.

        Parameters:
        container - The container holding the game.
        game - This game.
        counter - An interface providing access to a loading screen.
        Throws:
        SlickException - Indicates an internal error occurred in the game.

      • getStates

        public HashMap getStates()
                  throws SlickException
        A method that gets the hashmap containing all states in this game. This method uses reflection to bypass slick2Ds restrictions.
        Returns:
        A hashmap.
        Throws:
        SlickException - If an error occurs trying to get all game states.
